channel.title: Mathematics on David A W Barton
channel.description: Recent content in Mathematics on David A W Barton

item.title: Stability of delay differential equations (DDEs) in Julia
item.description: Another in my series of 'try not to implement it yet again', this time on how to calculate the stability of (linearised) delay differential equations.

item.title: Collocation for finding periodic orbits of ODEs
item.description: Computing periodic orbits of ordinary differential equations (ODEs) with collocation is a relatively quick and easy thing to do. Here I demonstrate the method using both Julia and MATLAB with Fourier collocation.
